hero.title: Hello, I'm
hero.subtitle: Web Developer
hero.description: I combine design and code with natural balance.

footer.description: Hello, I'm Fatih İnan. Software, web development, camping, motorcycle, music, sports, guitar, photography and more. 2002 z generation

description.part1: 23 years old. I've been interested in computers since childhood; I've been involved in IT and web design since high school. I learned ASP.NET in the 11th grade and PHP in the 12th grade, then studied Computer Programming at Eskişehir Osmangazi University. I worked as a POS specialist for about 2 years, which gave me valuable experience.
description.part2: Technology is a big part of my life, but it's not everything. I have passions like motorcycles, guitars, cameras, and camping gear. I go to rock/metal concerts; however, returning to work is now my priority as I need financial resources to pursue my other passions.
description.part3: Instead of jumping from one thing to another, I created this blog site to make a solid start. I'm continuing to develop myself by applying what I've learned and aiming to gain experience and earn income through e-commerce projects in the long term.

blog.description: Articles about web development, design and my personal experiences
blog.noPostsDescription: There are no posts available in this category at the moment. Please check back later or explore other categories.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.description: Activities and passions that make my life livable

camping.title: Camping
camping.description: Moments of disconnecting from screens and sometimes people, while enjoying the beauty of nature. Time spent in harmony with the outdoors.

motorcycle.title: Motorcycle
motorcycle.description: Exploring new routes, feeling the sense of freedom, enjoying a curated playlist, and creating unforgettable memories on the road.

films&Music.title: Movies & Music
films&Music.description: I share the movies, series, and music I discover and enjoy. May the music you love bring inspiration to your soul.

sports.title: Fitness & Calisthenics
sports.description: I train to protect my mental health, prevent posture issues caused by screen time, and shape myself into who I want to become.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: Capturing beautiful moments, documenting the wonders of nature and life, and sharing them for others to experience.

design.title: Design
design.description: I emphasize visual aesthetics in my designs. Drawing inspiration from natural balance, I blend different perspectives to create unique and meaningful solutions.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact me! For new projects, collaborations or just to say hello...

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.cta: I continue to build bridges between nature and code; if you would like to collaborate or share your questions, feel free to contact me.

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.description: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page.
